_header: The first day when Christ was born
_description: A Christmas carol — five quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ‘I thanke it a maydyn euery dyll’ and burden: ‘Nowel el el el el / I thank it a maydyn euery del’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
The fyrst day wan crist was borneTher sprong a ros owt of a
                    þorne…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…for us he sofered a dedly wondynI thanke it a maydyn euery
                    dyll
